name: Mask of Draconic
description: ATK upon Draconics increase by 40%, and DMG resistance against Draconics increase by 20%.

ATK upon Draconics increase by 57%, and DMG resistance against Draconics increase by 28%.

story: A mask modeled after the face of a Draconic. It resonates with the roar of smoldering evil.
